JDate is The World’s Premier Jewish Dating Site!

When you’re searching for a partner, the world can seem like a big place. How do you find that special someone when there are so many "someones"? 1.8 million Jewish singles turn to JDate when looking for lasting love, fulfilling friendships or a fabulous date. That’s because JDate embraces all that makes you YOU, highlighting your best and most unique qualities in a profile you can create in just minutes – for free! Then, we help connect you with Jewish singles – both locally and globally – who fit your dreams. That’s not just matchmaking; It’s actually pretty magical.

Most importantly, your Jewish dating journey should be fun and exciting. JDate offers the best communications tools – message and chat, along with mobile apps that allow you to meet like-minded Jewish men and Jewish women anytime, anywhere. Want to get an even better handle on your love life? An AllAccess subscription allows you to communicate with anyone on the site – even non-subscribers! We leave no stone unturned when it comes to unearthing the right person for you.

What are the leading experts saying about love, dating and sex? Need advice on a budding romance? Want some inspiration in the form of Success Stories? JLife, our new digital companion resource, makes you a Jewish dating insider.

Are you looking for Jewish singles near youv Check out some of our top cities: Jewish singles in Los Angeles, Jewish singles in New York or Jewish singles in Miami. Check out the complete list of Jewish singles near you.

Or maybe your approach to Judaism is key, so Orthodox dating is your wheelhouse. Reform Jewish singles might be a better fit. Jewish diversity is JDate’s middle name.

The beauty of Jewish traditions is that they’re shared. JDate provides a worldwide network, partnering with Jewish non–profit organizations, cultural leaders and relationship experts. You’ll find everything from a Synagogue Directory to the Jewish Holiday Calendar.

Since 1997, JDate has been growing the Jewish community, one Success Story at a time.
